title: Can't Accpet game and go's back to queue
body: When I try to queue up for a game the accept button never comes up and it just puts me back into queue

replies.body: Your network could be having a really hard time getting linked up with the game lobby you're trying to get into. Without a good stable connection, it can be rough for the client to get you into those game lobbies. Try going through [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get you into those games again.
